name: Dia de los muertos
description: MMLDC is happy to announce that our annual Dia de Los Muertos Costume Party will be on Nov 1st. this year so mark your calendars. The DJ will be playing all the best Musica Latina to keep us dancing all night (Cumbia, Salsa, Bachata, Timba, Rock en Español, Merengue, y más. We can’t wait to see all the wonderful costumes this year.
